perturbation.original_text: 7.2 Milestone Payments. Aimmune shall pay to Xencor the one-time milestone payments described in this Section 7.2 following achievement (and only upon the first occurrence) of the corresponding milestone event for a Product. Aimmune shall promptly notify Xencor in writing of, but in no event later than [***] ([***]) days after, the achievement of each such milestone event with respect to a Product. Aimmune shall pay the applicable milestone payment by wire transfer of immediately available funds within [***] ([***]) days after the achievement (and only upon the first occurrence) of the applicable milestone event into an account designated by Xencor in writing. Each such milestone payment is nonrefundable and noncreditable against any other payments due hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text: 7.2 Milestone Payments. Aimmune shall pay to Xencor the one-time milestone payments described in this Section 7.2 following achievement (and only upon the first occurrence) of the corresponding milestone event for a Product. Aimmune shall promptly notify Xencor in writing of, but in no event later than [***] ([***]) days after, the achievement of each such milestone event with respect to a Product. Aimmune shall pay the applicable milestone payment by wire transfer of immediately available funds within [***] ([***]) days after the achievement (and only upon the first occurrence) of the applicable milestone event into an account designated by Xencor in writing. Each such milestone payment is refundable and creditable against any other payments due hereunder.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction by changing milestone payments from "nonrefundable and noncreditable" to "refundable and creditable", creating ambiguity about their financial treatment and affecting payment enforcement.

perturbation.original_text: 8.1 Royalty Payments and Reports. The royalty payments due by Aimmune to Xencor under Section 7.3 shall be calculated, reported and paid for each Calendar Quarter within [***] ([***]) days after the end of each Calendar Quarter and shall be accompanied by a report setting forth Net Sales of Products by Aimmune in sufficient detail to permit confirmation of the accuracy of the royalty payment made, including the gross sales and Net Sales of each Product, on a country-by-country basis, and the exchange rates used in accordance with Section 8.2. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, Aimmune shall require its Affiliates and other Aimmune Agreement Entities to account for its Net Sales and to provide such reports with respect thereto as if such sales were made by Aimmune.
perturbation.changed_text: 8.1 Royalty Payments and Reports. The royalty payments due by Aimmune to Xencor under Section 7.3 shall be calculated, reported and paid for each Calendar Quarter within [***] ([***]) days after the end of each Calendar Quarter and shall be accompanied by a report setting forth Net Sales of Products by Aimmune in sufficient detail to permit confirmation of the accuracy of the royalty payment made, including the gross sales and Net Sales of each Product, on a country-by-country basis, and the exchange rates used in accordance with Section 8.2. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, Aimmune shall not require its Affiliates and other Aimmune Agreement Entities to account for its Net Sales and to provide such reports with respect thereto as if such sales were made by Aimmune.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a contradiction in reporting obligations by negating the requirement for Aimmune to include affiliate sales data, which affects the accuracy and enforcement of royalty payments.

perturbation.original_text: 8.5 Late Payments. In the event that any payment due under this Agreement is not sent to Xencor when due in accordance with the applicable provisions of Sections 7.1, 7.2, or 8.1, the payment shall accrue interest from the date due at the [***], plus an additional [***] percentage points ([***] ppts); provided, however, that (a) in the event that more than [***] payment due under this Agreement is not received by Xencor when due, the foregoing rate shall increase to the prime rate plus an additional [***] percentage points ([***] ppts) per year calculated on the number of days such payment is delinquent, compounded annually and computed on the basis of a three hundred sixty five (365) day year, and (b) in no event shall such rate exceed the maximum legal annual interest rate. The payment of such interest shall not limit Xencor from exercising any other rights it may have as a consequence of the lateness of any payment.
perturbation.changed_text: 8.5 Late Payments. In the event that any payment due under this Agreement is not sent to Xencor when due in accordance with the applicable provisions of Sections 7.1, 7.2, or 8.1, the payment shall accrue interest from the date due at the [***], plus an additional [***] percentage points ([***] ppts); provided, however, that (a) in the event that more than [***] payment due under this Agreement is not received by Xencor when due, the foregoing rate shall decrease to the prime rate less an additional [***] percentage points ([***] ppts) per year calculated on the number of days such payment is delinquent, compounded annually and computed on the basis of a three hundred sixty five (365) day year, and (b) in no event shall such rate exceed the maximum legal annual interest rate. The payment of such interest shall not limit Xencor from exercising any other rights it may have as a consequence of the lateness of any payment.
perturbation.explanation: This modifies the interest calculation for late payments, changing the 'increase' to 'decrease', creating a direct contradiction and making enforcement ambiguous.
